dt: {bc}the act, the process, or an instance of mixing
{bc}the proportion of fuel to air produced in a carburetor
{bc}a portion of matter consisting of two or more components in varying proportions that retain their own properties
{bc}a fabric woven of variously colored threads

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French & Latin; Anglo-French, from Latin {it}mixtura{/it}, from {it}mixtus{/it}
shortdef: the act, the process, or an instance of mixing
the relative proportions of constituents; especially : the proportion of fuel to air produced in a carburetor

dt: {bc}a fungicide made by combination of copper sulfate, lime, and water

shortdef: a fungicide made by combination of copper sulfate, lime, and water

dt: {bc}a usually sweet liquid that contains medicine used to stop coughing

shortdef: a usually sweet liquid that contains medicine used to stop coughing
